title: The Wizard of god
description: Embark on an epic journey through a timeless and familiar landscape.Grace, a young woman with a troubled past, is transported to a dreamlike land called god. There, she meets three unforgettable characters and together they set out in search of the one person who can help Grace find her way home.Along the road, they encounter opposing forces battling for the hearts and minds of the people of the oppressive “godvernment” and the bright and modern EC, the city with a dark secret.A mysterious man continually reappears offering free meals to the needy, but what are his motives? Can he be trusted?Will Grace survive the land of god?“If you’ve ever felt lost while traveling through the land of god, this is your story.” Stephen and Brooke
author: Stephen Roy
